name: Fruit Loko 2
description:
Fruit Loko Remixed

FAMILY-FRIENDLY, GREAT APP FOR KIDS!

Fruit Loko is now FREE on the IPAD!

Move Vax the fish around the screen simply with your touch!

Collect Fruit and Avoid the Spikefish!

Extremely Easy and Addictive!

FEATURES:

- High Resolution Retina Display Graphics!
- Two Gameplay modes! Classic and Loko!
- Classic Mode has 20 Levels!
- Gain Points to Unlock Fruit!
- Gamecenter Achievements!
- Gamecenter Leaderboards!
- Twitter Support! Tweet your High Scores!
- Try Expert Mode after Unlocking All Fruit!
